amendment.description: To require a report on the implementation of recommendations of the Defense Science Board on preventing and defending against clandestine nuclear attack.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3833 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3833 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator Akaka. (consideration: CR S10351-10358) To require a report on the implementation of recommendations of the Defense Science Board on preventing and defending against clandestine nuclear attack.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3833 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3833 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator Akaka.
